attachEscrow(address,address).details: Assigns an existing escrow to a protocol

createEscrow(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Creates a new escrow for a protocol

params.oracles: The addresses of the signers who can release the funds
params.protocol: The address of the contract to protect
params.timeLimit: How long the funds should stay locked up until release (if the team does not respond)
params.token: The address of the token that is being stored in the protocols smart contracts
params.tokenThreshold: The amount per tx to limit on withdraw

documentation.text: @dev Assigns an existing escrow to a protocol
